医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
泰国红树林的基因组保护在本次采访中，泰国国家 Omic 中心主任 Wirulda Pootakham 向 NewsMedical 讲述了泰国红树林的基因组保护问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Genomic-conservation-in-Thailands-mangroves.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Genomic-conservation-in-Thailands-mangroves.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee5510e1-ffbf-4d0a-b9a5-6e1b4c058b91 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 06:57:00 -0500 Genomic conservation in Thailand's mangroves
45 年的进展：预防和筛查避免了数百万人的癌症死亡研究表明，癌症预防和筛查工作在五种主要癌症类型中避免了 594 万人死亡，凸显了其关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/45-years-of-progress-Prevention-and-screening-avert-millions-of-cancer-deaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/45-years-of-progress-Prevention-and-screening-avert-millions-of-cancer-deaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=817406fd-af33-4088-b69e-a25a5d4e0a7e Fri, 06 Dec 2024 06:56:00 -0500 45 years of progress: Prevention and screening avert millions of cancer deaths
细胞外囊泡 DNA 调节免疫反应并抑制肝转移该研究强调了 EV-DNA 包装如何影响免疫反应及其作为评估结直肠癌转移风险的生物标志物的前景。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Extracellular-vesicle-DNA-regulates-immune-responses-and-suppresses-liver-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Extracellular-vesicle-DNA-regulates-immune-responses-and-suppresses-liver-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6bd1d68-bc76-440b-93d0-af867e483604 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 06:35:00 -0500 Extracellular vesicle DNA regulates immune responses and suppresses liver metastasis
麻疹、百日咳和更严重的疾病如何在小罗伯特·肯尼迪的领导下卷土重来安全、有效的新冠疫苗在疫情爆发不到一年的时间里问世，标志着 300 年疫​​苗接种历史上的一个高峰，似乎预示着一个预防传染病的时代的到来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/How-measles-whooping-cough-and-worse-could-roar-back-on-RFK-Jre28099s-watch.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/How-measles-whooping-cough-and-worse-could-roar-back-on-RFK-Jre28099s-watch.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d751a294-0117-40fb-94c3-76fe907158f2 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 05:49:05 -0500 How measles, whooping cough, and worse could roar back on RFK Jr.’s watch
新的计算管道确定了阿尔茨海默病的关键生物标志物哥伦比亚大学梅尔曼公共卫生学院的研究人员开发了一种新型计算管道，旨在识别与阿尔茨海默病 (AD) 等复杂疾病相关的蛋白质生物标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/New-computational-pipeline-identizes-key-biomarkers-for-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/New-computational-pipeline-identizes-key-biomarkers-for-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4e4577e-f258-4f1a-9be2-a385186bc519 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 00:30:15 -0500 New computational pipeline identifies key biomarkers for Alzheimer's disease
新研究将特定大肠杆菌菌株与较高的癌症发病率联系起来在英国等国家，某些癌症的较高发病率可能与两种特定的细菌菌株有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/New-study-links-special-E-coli-strains-to-higher-cancer-incidence-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/New-study-links-specific-E-coli-strains-to-higher-cancer-incidence-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a3f9cff-afbc-4173-b1a3-4d8d5ae94f4a Fri, 06 Dec 2024 00:00:00 -0500 New study links specific E. coli strains to higher cancer incidence rates
AI 通过全身 MRI 预测死亡率，提供个性化的健康见解研究人员开发了一种深度学习框架，用于基于 MRI 的全身身体成分分析，比传统方法更准确地预测死亡率。这种创新方法可以彻底改变个性化风险评估和临床工作流程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/AI-predicts-mortality-with-whole-body-MRI-for-personalized-health-insights.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/AI-predicts-mortality-with-whole-body-MRI-for-personalized-health-insights.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=198500e3-568f-492d-a9b0-914c5e45aef5 Thu, 05 Dec 2024 23:01:00 -0500 AI predicts mortality with whole-body MRI for personalized health insights
新基因疗法有望预防早产地球上数十亿人的生命归功于在母亲子宫里支撑和滋养他们的临时器官。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/New-gene-therapy-shows-promise-in-preventing-premature-births.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/New-gene-therapy-shows-promise-in-preventing-premature-births.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33367276-295e-4c2a-8af3-55f91200266b Thu, 05 Dec 2024 22:05:00 -0500 New gene therapy shows promise in preventing premature births

赛洛西宾有助于减少临床医生在 COVID-19 危机中的抑郁症裸盖菇素辅助心理治疗使 2020 年和 2021 年提供一线 COVID-19 护理的临床医生的抑郁症显着减少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Psilocybin-helps-reduce-depression-in-clinicians-amid-COVID-19-crisis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Psilocybin-helps-reduce-depression-in-clinicians-amid-COVID-19-crisis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82134f18-14f8-4df6-b1df-75bcc7df01a8 Thu, 05 Dec 2024 21:55:42 -0500 Psilocybin helps reduce depression in clinicians amid COVID-19 crisis
